review: (Translated by Google) Mac and cheese, too sour, very salty. I just love cheese, I won't finish this. A lot left. The pizza is the opposite, the bread is delicious. Prefer the bread at dominos over the shop next door. The topping is delicious too. The service has no medicine, friendly. During the day, the room temperature is not as cold as at the Alfamart next door. (Original) Mac and cheesenya, terlalu eneg, asin banget. Ak yang doyan keju aja, ini ga aku habisin. Sisa banyak. Pizzanya kebalikan, rotinya enak. Lebih suka roti di domino dari pda di toko sebelah. Topingnya juga enak. Servicenya ga ada obat, ramah. Waktu siang, suhu ruangan tidak sedingin di alfamart sebelah.

(Translated by Google) Try the new user promo. Pizza mania price so 7500 before tax. You can buy a lot directly. Untuk delivery sih kurang tau jarak maksimalnya berapa kilometer, karena rumah saya hanya berjarak 5 km pesan delivery tidak bisa.

(Translated by Google) Friendly service even if you only buy a little, quite fast too. There are various kinds of payments, cash or non-cash (shopeepay, funds, ovo, gopay, etc.).
